responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you through apple's stock FAQ

patterns: How can I get the current Apple stock price?
responses: A https://investor.apple.com/stock-price/default.aspx as well as other information regarding Apple stock is provided by Ticker Technologies

patterns: Does Apple pay a cash dividend?
responses: Yes. Learn more about Apple’s dividend history. Learn more about Apple’s dividend history. https://investor.apple.com/dividend-history/default.aspx

patterns: What exchange does Apple stock trade on?
responses: Apple stock is traded on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the ticker symbol AAPL.

patterns: How many times has Apple’s stock split?
responses: Apple’s stock has split five times since the company went public. The stock split on a 4-for-1 basis on August 28, 2020, a 7-for-1 basis on June 9, 2014, and split on a 2-for-1 basis on February 28, 2005, June 21, 2000, and June 16, 1987..
